title: Nukeproof Mullet the Mega and Giga enduro bikes for 297 mixed wheel framesets
content:
Elliot Heap and Katy Winton are two Nukeproof riders who have been reaping the benefits of a mullet setup this season. Now, you can too, with the release of the Nukeproof Mega 297 and Giga 297 framesets. And don’t worry, if you’re already a V4 Mega or Giga 290 owner, there’s an aftermarket MX conversion

The post Nukeproof Mullet the Mega and Giga enduro bikes for 297 mixed wheel framesets appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
